snippet: Dreadlocked German Dustin Brown was back treating Wimbledon crowds to his unique brand of swashbuckling tennis on Tuesday, winning a quickfire five-setter against Serbia's Dusan Lajovic....
lead_paragraph: Dreadlocked German Dustin Brown was back treating Wimbledon crowds to his unique brand of swashbuckling tennis on Tuesday, winning a quickfire five-setter against Serbia's Dusan Lajovic.

headline.print_headline: Entertainer Brown Turns on the Style
headline.main: Entertainer Brown Turns on the Style
